body:
Yeah i'd be kinda worried about him too.

And theres like 20+ chapters of this same crap? I mean come on, its fun first few chapters but it gets old.
The author need to make his mind, what will this story happen? Is it in the end she will left him ? I starting to lose my patients with this story.

ugh~ the author is definitely dragging the story now.. couldn't the author just make another story concept.. -_- if he meant to drag it until his wife left him.. then what makes it different with another netotare stories..
